artist: Engraver: Thomas Cheesman; Painter: After Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri); Draftsman: Pierre Violet; Printer: Peltro William Tomkins; Publisher: Cadell and Davies
description: Christ and two angels in the sepluchre; Christ with shoulders against a stone ledge and head resting on it; angels on right with one resting head on hands
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [CHRIST IN THE SEPLUCHRE/ From the original Picture by Guercino in the Possession of...(cut off)]; on sheet in pencil: [1-508]
title: Christ in the Sepulchre
